Label: Action
Definition: An action that has been carried out as a part of responding to a NEED.

Label: Attribute
Definition: A state of a person or household.

Label: Case
Definition: A container for information recording the history of events for a person or household who may have needs.

Label: Contact Event
Definition: A record of an event in which the situation of a person or household was sought.

Label: Delivery Organisation
Definition: A service provider who delivers actions that respond to a NEED.

Label: Household
Definition: A collection of PERSONs who live together.

Label: Lead Organisation
Definition: An organisation responsible for coordinating a vulnerability initiative.

Label: Need
Definition: The need where assistance is required to mitigate a vulnerability.

Label: Outcome
Definition: The resulting situation of a CASE, or a NEED

Label: Person
Definition: A Person who may be vulnerable, or who needs assistance.

Label: Plan
Definition: A set of planned actions designed to respond to a NEED over a period.

Label: Provenance
Definition: A record of the steps taken to prepare a peice of data.

Label: Residence
Definition: A building, or a part of a building, designed to accommodate a single HOUSEHOLD.

Label: Responsible Organisation
Definition: An organisation who is made responsible for a CASE.

Label: Risk Assessment
Definition: A Categorisation of the Risk of a PERSON or HOUSEHOLD.

Label: Situation Assessment
Definition: An understanding of the situation of a PERSON or HOUSEHOLD as a result of a contact.

Label: Source Organisation
Definition: An organisation that provides ATTRIBUTE data

Label: Stratification Policy
Definition: A definition of the rules by which Risk Categories will be determined
